"صواريخ غزة" تكشف نقطة ضعف إسرائيل.. وملادينوف بالقطاع الاثنين المقبل

02 Nov 2019

رام الله - دنيا الوطنقالت قناة (كان) الإسرائيلية: إن مبعوث الأمم المتحدة لعملية السلام، نيكولاي ملادينوف، سيصل قطاع غزة، الاثنين المقبل، وذلك من أجل إجراء محادثات مع قيادة حركة حماس بشأن الانتخابات والمشاريع الأممية في القطاع.وأوضح القناة، وفق مصادر لم تسمها، أن الموعد تم تحديده قبل التصعيد الذي وقع الليلة الماضية، والذي أدى لقصف إسرائيلي لقطاع غزة.وفي السياق، قال المحلل الإسرائيلي أمير بوخبوط: إن إطلاق الصواريخ من غزة، كشف عن نقطة ضعف إسرائيل، مضيفاً: "بينما ينشغل الجيش الإسرائيلي بالتحديات الكبيرة، ويركز على أهداف بعيدة مثل إيران والعراق واليمن، تمكن قادة المنظمات في قطاع غزة من استغلال الاهتمام الموجه إلى مختلف الساحات إلى جانب الاضطراب السياسي في إسرائيل".وأضاف بوخبوط: "عدم وجود رئيس وزراء، ووزير جيش متفرغ لمتابعة القضايا على مدار الساعة، كل ذلك تم استغلاله من غزة لزيادة الضغط، نحن نقترب من اللحظة التي سيطرح فيها سؤال في (كابينت) ما إذا كان ينبغي تغيير سياسة استعادة الهدوء مع غزة.وفي السياق، قالت القناة الإسرائيلية الـ 13: إن رئيس الوزراء بينامين نتنياهو، أجرى خلال الليل تقييماً للوضع الأمني في (الكرياه) في تل أبيب، بمشاركة رئيس الأركان، ورئيس الشاباك، ورئيس مجلس الأمن القومي، وقادة الجيش الإسرائيلي.

Bolsonaro criticizes Rede Globo again
02 Nov 2019 by The People
President Jair Bolsonaro again criticized on Saturday, 2, Rede Globo. On two separate occasions, during a conversation with popular and journalists, the president spontaneously referred to the broadcaster, said the "mamata" had run out - in reference to federal government advertising funds - and once again threatened to adopt strict criteria to renew the company's concession. "You have to be tidy for 2022, huh, I'm giving the warning first!" He said. This was the third time in the week that Bolsonaro went public to criticize the company and talk about renewing the concession. The attacks began last Tuesday, 29, following the broadcast by the station of a report about the testimony of the concierge of the condominium Vivendas da Barra, in Rio, where Bolsonaro has a home. The official told police that on the day of death Marielle Franco and chauffeur Anderson Gomes, former PM Elcio Queiroz, suspected of involvement in the crime, said he would go to House 58, which belongs to the president. He further stated that he intercomped with the house and that he had received permission from "his Jair". The report showed that House of Representatives panel records indicated the presence of Bolsonaro in Brasilia on the day of the councilwoman's death. "A cowardly, hypocritical journalism bastard of TV Globo. All the while chasing me, my family and my friends . Why this? ", He said in the morning, when he went to a dealership in Brasilia to get a motorcycle he bought. Soon after, when asked, he stated that he would not ask the company for a right of reply. "If Globo is embarrassed in the face, don't wait for my lawsuit, make room for me." The newspaper Jornal Nacional heard the president's lawyer. Earlier on Saturday evening, during a conversation with popular people, Bolsonaro spoke again about the Rio-based station. Seeing that there were cameras recording his meeting with protesters, the president questioned. "And Globo, have you found out who killed Marielle? Was it me or not?" Sought, Rede Globo had not manifested until the publication of this story. AttacksIn addition to comments Saturday, Bolsonaro criticized the company twice this week, in "lives" on Facebook. The first of these was broadcast shortly after the report was aired. The other time, on Thursday, had similar content. Bolsonaro's attacks were not restricted to Globo. This week, he said he would ban federal agencies from subscribing to the newspaper Folha de S.Paulo. He further stated that advertisers should "pay attention". Even before the Globo report aired, Bolsonaro posted a video that compared press vehicles to hyenas last Monday, but deleted it two hours later. The video featured a lion, which would symbolize the President of the Republic, surrounded by hyenas, who would represent press vehicles, Brazilian Bar Association, Supreme Court (STF). Given the negative repercussions, the president apologized. "I apologize publicly to the STF, who may have been offended. It was an injustice, yes, we corrected and we will publish a story that takes this side of the apology. Bolsonaro on occasion.
